website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking vessel faucet with a strong flow rate and a low-arc spout.
pros: Available in either a polished chrome or brushed nickel finish
Single handle on the faucet nicely controls both the water flow and temperature
Spout has a 5-inch reach to give you plenty of flexibility whererever you place it
cons: Spout positioning may not fit all sinks perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Structurally solid product
customer_reviews.text: I had a leaky faucet so I need a new one to replace it. I have similar faucets (K-12182-CP) in other bathroom and they have been working fine for several years. So I decided to buy this, which has a 6 inch escutcheon to cover two extra holes on left and right side. Only problem I have with this item is it is constricting water flow so much that it feels like the valve is a half way open when it is opened fully. I had to take out the 1/4 inch O ring from the constrictor and I see the full pressure of water flowing through.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Install and check!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had 3 replaced after 19 years of good service. Old ones were very corroded from our hard water and one was starting to leak. One problem with the installation: the sticker on the cold water connector was on the hot water connector on one of the fixtures. Thus hot water and cold water were reversed. Plumber was surprised!!! He had not run the water to check. He came back and fixed. Said it had never happened before! Probably a dyslectic worker at the factory.😇
customer_reviews.author: BobC

customer_reviews.title: Well made & easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish are great, the water lines are long, everything was simple to hook-up. Looks perfect in our retro bathroom. One note, I installed it on a shallow 24" vanity, there was not clearance for the drain ball-rod at the bottom. For some reason this was about 2 inches longer than the American standard unit it replaced. I was able to get around this by cutting it with a hacksaw.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Feinberg

customer_reviews.title: Check Your Plumber's Guarantee!
customer_reviews.text: After using an identical pair of these faucets for 17 years, we bought two replacements. We had them both professionally installed, but within 24 hours, one faucet was leaking on top of the base. Having purchased them ourselves, the plumber's guarantee didn't cover the faucet, so now we are purchasing the replacement through the plumbing company and we have to pay an additional 150.00 to have it installed. We weren't going to take a chance by buying another one of these faucets through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: leaking faucet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two to match other faucets that were already in the house. One of them is leaking. So now I have to do a repair of the valve inside. Assuming it is only a rubber washer but still, I have to take the faucet apart, drive 24 miles back and forth to the closest hardware store to get a 10 cent washer. This quality product should not be leaking from day one.
customer_reviews.author: ben muller

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this faucet a few months ago, installed it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this faucet a few months ago, installed it per the instructions, leaked immediately from the area around the cold water valve / handle. Got a replacement faucet, installed it correctly per the instructions again, worked OK for 2 weeks. Now, this one is also leaking, from the hot water valve / handle this time. Also, the faucet doesn't correctly mix the hot and cold water correctly - there is way too much hot water in the mix. Now we're outside the return period, so I have to call Kohler customer support to see if this faucet can be salvaged.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Quality classic faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic style and finish. Had them in last house and wanted to install them in our present house, too. One head’s up: we put granite backsplashes in this house and there is not enough room for the drain pull between the fixture and the granite. They were fine when we had a tile backsplash.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi F.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look, Solid Build
customer_reviews.text: Bought two on Amazon and am very happy with product. Had a professional plumber install them (not my thing) and he was impressed with the brass and solid build. The base of each hot/cold tap and the faucet have a wide base--about 2 1/2 inches--which is hard to find if you are trying to cover older fixtures that have left rather permanent marks on the vanity top. There are less expensive faucet sets out there (and certainly more expensive) but I would buy this again happily.
customer_reviews.author: californialocal

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 2 SETS FOR BOTH OUR UPSTAIRS BATHROOMS. WHICH WE WERE REMODELING. KOHLER IS THE BEST. ALL METAL PARTS. NO PLASTIC TO WEAR OUT. IT'S A WATER SAVER BUT WE WILL LIVE WITH THAT. THE LOOK IS SLEEK AND MODERN. IT GOES WELL WITH MY KOHLER HARDWARE. IT REALLY MAKES THE BATHROOMS.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We had our contractor put this in over a week ago and it works great and looks beautiful. Be sure to allow for the drain stopper pull. We almost didn’t have enough room but that’s not the fault of this beautiful faucet.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Faucett
customer_reviews.text: I like these. Installed two. As soon as I figured out plumbers putty for the drain, it was easy. Quality is fine. I have two more to install if these are discounted again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: In 30 years of remodeling, I have never had a problem with any Kohler product. Their faucets are solid, well built and operate very smoothly. I have also used Delta, Moen, Price Pfister, American Standard and cheaper faucets when the home owners budget required it. Kohler is hands down the best product, using heavy brass castings and far fewer plastic parts. I have a lot of customers I have served for almost 30 years and I have never had a call-back for any Kohler product. Delta offers free, no questions asked replacement parts for life, but I have never had a need to replace any parts with the Kohler product line.
customer_reviews.author: JJRam

customer_reviews.title: great bathroom faucett

customer_reviews.title: Great faucets!

I had looked elsewhere previously at the single handle faucet and only saw very contemporary , which these are not. The price was also far better than the local plumbing supply house which did not stock these and would have taken far longer to receive. Another hit from Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Really? Plastic?
customer_reviews.text: Plastic instead of ceramic porcelin? from Kohler? I would have thought this company would have made a better product. customer_reviews.title: Sent it right back
customer_reviews.text: What isn't completely obvious from the picture unless you look closely is that the outer surface of the spout is in two halves, an upper and lower half, and they meet on the sides. With the copy I got, there was close to a 1/16" gap on the right side, so you could see right in, and at best it would be a pain in the behind to keep clean. Another copy might be better but it seems like an unfortunate design.

Style:Single Handle| Color:Polished ChromeFairfax faucets bring a touch of elegance and nostalgia to the bathroom. With a simple curved spout and an ergonomic, single-lever handle, this Fairfax sink faucet offers a graceful design that fits a wide variety of bathroom configurations and styles.

AMAZON.COM
Classic style, graceful curves and outstanding performance describe this Fairfax lavatory faucet. Its fluid arc and lively detailing create a timeless appeal, making Fairfax at home in a contemporary or traditional bath or powder room. Featuring temperature memory and a high-temperature limit stop to prevent scalding, the faucet may be turned on and off at any temperature setting. All metal construction and ceramic valving ensure reliable, lasting operation. Available in a wide array of durable, lustrous finish choices, including Vibrant® PVD color finishes, the Fairfax faucet easily withstands the demands of daily use. The gentle slopes and rounded edges of the Fairfax line of faucets and accessories deliver a charming effect in any bathroom. Fairfax faucets are available in a variety of single-control and two-handle models with an escutcheon plate or ring to suit your individual preference and sink configuration needs. All solid color/finish Fairfax faucets come standard with White "Hot/Cold" plug buttons. Interchangeable plug buttons, in a variety of colors and finishes, are also available.

 KOHLER Bathroom Faucets and Accessories
Expectations have changed for today’s bathrooms. But whether you’re creating a serene, spa-like environment in the master bath or breathing new life and character into a powder room, KOHLER® bathroom faucets and accessories provide inspiration and lasting performance. Crafted from premium quality materials, our faucets and accessories are available in a wide array of colors and finishes, including Vibrant® PVD color finishes that are remarkably resistant to staining, corrosion and tarnish. Our ceramic disc valves are tested for 500,000 on/off cycles – twice the industry standard – to deliver reliability and long life. Additionally, Rite-Temp® showering technology ensures water temperatures do not fluctuate. KOHLER bathroom faucets and accessories embody innovative excellence from fresh twists on vintage styling to pioneering the use of different materials. And "No Sweat" installation with flexible water supplies and pre-assembled valves saves you time, effort and money. With design themes ranging from classic to contemporary and our tradition of meticulous craftsmanship, KOHLER bathroom faucets and accessories allow you to express your personal sense of style with confidence.

 Vibrant® PVD Color Finish 
Kohler Co. sets an industry benchmark for faucets with its Vibrant finish. Working at the molecular level, the Vibrant process enables Kohler Co. to produce faucets in a variety of polished and brushed color/finish options. All possess a luster that clearly shines through for the life of the faucet. Kohler Co. employs a state-of-the-art Physical Vapor Deposition (PVD) process to create the Vibrant finish. The process creates an incredibly strong surface and a remarkably durable finish; one that is resistant to scratching, tarnishing and corrosion.

 All KOHLER faucets carry a lifetime limited warranty for as long as the original consumer/purchaser owns his or her home.

 About Kohler Co.
Founded in 1873 and headquartered in Kohler, Wisconsin, Kohler Co. is one of America’s oldest and largest privately held companies. Kohler is a global leader in the manufacture of kitchen and bath products, engines and power generation systems, cabinetry, tile and luxury home furnishings, and international host to award-winning hospitality and world-class golf destinations. Kohler Co. is known around the world for plumbing products, its traditional core business, and its flagship brand: KOHLER.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Single-control lavatory faucet for single-hole installation. KOHLER ceramic disc valves exceed industry longevity standards two times for a lifetime of durable performance. Premium material for durability and reliability. KOHLER finishes resist corrosion and tarnishing, exceeding industry durability standards two times. Flexible stainless steel supplies simplify installation.
